data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (average_errors IS NULL OR average_errors < 1)) AS 'Health Score' FROM mysql_query FACET mysql_query_name
SELECT uniqueCount(mysql_query_name) AS 'Querys' FROM mysql_query FACET mysql_instance_name

presentation.title: Instance Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Instance of this Query

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(mysql_query_name) AS 'Querys' FROM mysql_query FACET mysql_database_name

presentation.title: Database Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Database of this Query

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_latency) FROM mysql_query COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Latency (Picoseconds)
presentation.notes: The average wait time per timed occurrence of the statement

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_lock_latency) FROM mysql_query COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Lock Latency (Picoseconds)
presentation.notes: The average time waiting for locks per timed occurrence of the statement

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_temporary_tables_created_in_memory) FROM mysql_query COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Temporary Tables Created In-Memory (Rows)
presentation.notes: The average number of internal in-memory temporary tables created per occurrence of the statement

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_temporary_tables_created_on_disk) FROM mysql_query COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Temporary Tables Created On-Disk (Rows)
presentation.notes: The average number of internal on-disk temporary tables created per occurrence of the statement

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_errors) FROM mysql_query COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Errors
presentation.notes: The total number of errors produced by occurrences of the statement

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_warnings) FROM mysql_query COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Warnings
presentation.notes: The average number of warnings produced by occurrences of the statement

data.nrql: SELECT average(warning_count_rate) FROM mysql_query COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Warning Count (per Second)
presentation.notes: The total number of warnings produced by occurrences of the statement
